member.summary: Request model used for creating shipments

remarks.para: 1. in case of non-COD(eg prepaid), this value shall be null or the cod_amount parameter, shall not be included in the call
2. use dot '.' for decimals and no other symbol for thousands eg 1024.64

member.name: P:Dailycourier.CreateShipmentRequestModel.CollectionPointAddress
member.summary: The address of the collection point
member.remarks: Any additional address information (ie Country, City, County, Area etc), shall be concatenated after the actual address of this parameter eg "Park Lane 13, Hyde Park Corner, London, UK"
